nodes.text: Or Kono Arena was a gladiatorial arena located in the heart of Gorma-Koss, the largest Gormak settlement on Voss. Around 3640 BBY a bounty hunter in pursuit of the Republic General Thelonia Redrish, visited the arena and after defeating several rounds of beasts, won enough respect from the Gormak, who told him that Redrish went into the Dark Heart of the Nightmare Lands.
Or Kono Arena appears as an area on Voss in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
